omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		Postcode,
		NHSNumber
from omop_staging.sus_AE
where Postcode is not null
and NHSNumber is not null

omopColumns.name: zip
omopColumns.operation_description: Uppercase the postcode then insert the space in the correct location, if needed.
omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		Postcode,
		NHSNumber
from omop_staging.sus_AE
where Postcode is not null
and NHSNumber is not null

omopColumns.name: location_source_value
omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		Postcode,
		NHSNumber
from omop_staging.sus_AE
where Postcode is not null
and NHSNumber is not null
